评论概述: Dark purple/silver is NOT purple, it’s blue!
评论详情: I ordered this because my son likes different and fun suits for events. His date is wearing purple, and this is described as dark purple/silver, which was perfect for what he wanted. When it arrived, much to his disappointment, it is actually royal blue and silver. Not a speck or purple to be seen. I am returning it, but if you need one for royal blue or silver, it’s a total hit! It would be a show stopper for royal blue!

评论概述: Pay attention to the size chart.
评论详情: I bought this in a size Large, which is what I normally get for other shirts/jackets that I purchase. The Amazon page also said that "Large should fit me best." Shame on me for assuming that would be true. The jacket is far too small and I will be returning it and purchasing an X-Large. However, upon looking at the size chart now, it does seem that a Large from this company is only meant to be about a size 40R suit/40.6" chest. A previous reviewer mentioned that the size chart was inaccurate and said a Large would fit a 45" chest, but this must have been updated now. Therefore, I will take responsibility for not double checking the chart, but it should still be noted for other purchasers that this jacket will run smaller than one you might get from another company. I will also say the jacket material seems fairly thin, but it is indeed very shimmery and will work for what I need it for.

This was perfect for my ‘sparkle surprise Ken’ at our Barbie premier party. It would also be great for any other fancy event like Prom, NYE, wedding in Vegas, etc.  He wears an XL shirt and the XL in this fit perfectly.

评论概述: Runs way smaller than size chart
评论详情: Bought this in a size large for my husband who has a 45” chest based on the size chart and it was so small he couldn’t even get it on. We received it NYE and don’t have time to re-order. I’m a woman with a 39” chest about a size 12 and the large fit me pretty well, was tight in the shoulders but loose at the waist. I’m going to keep it and get it tailored for me but I have no idea how this was supposed to fit a man of the size on the size chart, esp in the arms and shoulders as it’s tight on my shoulders and I’m not built like a man. The length was good for me as a 5’9” woman but I like my jackets a little longer.
Very nice blazer, bought this for my husband and got a lot of compliments
